name: GameAnalytics
overview:
Our mission is to change the way game developers optimize game plays and monetize games across all devices and platforms.

GameAnalytics is free and relevant from early internal beta to full public launch of a game. It works across all platforms and on any device. Easy to implement - yet able to handle the most data-intensive games.

GameAnalytics will become an essential and important part of what is the fastest growing media industry in the world.
